General.Name: Kangyue Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Changjiang Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of internal combustion engines and parts, photovoltaic equipment, and pharmaceuticals in China and internationally. Its engages in production and sale of turbochargers and parts; photovoltaic equipment, such as laminating machines and stitch welding machines; tablets and hollow capsules; and Chinese herbal beverages, as well as pharmaceutical distribution business. The company was formerly known as Kangyue Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changjiang Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. in March 2023. Changjiang Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is based in Shouguang, China.
General.Address: Shouguang Economic Development Zone, Shouguang, China
